title: Facebook Political Ad Collector
slug: See the ads politicians and political groups are running on Facebook
guff: Facebook is rife with political advertising. Since early September, we have asked our users to use a Chrome extension and collects ads from politicians and political groups on Facebook. You can browse and search through the advertisements we've collected below. The ads shown here are automatically classified by a machine learning algorithm so there may be false positives. If you see anything interesting please let us know at jeff.larson@propublica.org.
